text: Not a Word About Love (Kein Wort von Liebe) is a 1937 Czechoslovak romance film, directed by Miroslav Cikán and Alwin Elling. It stars Ellen Schwanneke, Rolf Wanka, and Richard Romanowsky. It is the German-language version of Poslíček lásky (1937). == References == == External links == *Not a Word About Love at the Internet Movie Database Category:1937 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak romance films Category:1930s romance films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán Category:Czech films Category:Czech romantic films Category:German-language films Category:Czechoslovak black-and- white films Category:Czechoslovak multilingual films Category:1937 multilingual films
title: Not a Word About Love
